text: <@UM30MT6RF> <@U687RKK0E> <@U6740K1SP> for their patience and feedback on my multidimensional concatenation syntax PR as I stumbled through the iterations, and tolerance of probably too many GitHub notifications.

text: It's close. Technically we need a release with the deprecation first anyway...

text: It's a shame we couldn't get the deprecation in 1.6

text: I am wondering whether we really need the deprecation though. It looks like multiple successive semicolons in hvcat are used only once in the COSMO test suite and this looks more like a typo than being intentional: <https://juliahub.com/ui/RepoSearch?q=%3B%3B&f=.%2a.jl|https://juliahub.com/ui/RepoSearch?q=%3B%3B&f=.%2a.jl>
